<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Creates a pair of globals used to iterate the array of offloading entries by</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/offloading/amdgpu"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/offloading/amdgpu">amdgpu</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if an image is compatible with current system&#39;s environment. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// system environment is given as a &#39;target-id&#39; which has the form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &lt;target-id&gt; := &lt;processor&gt; ( &quot;:&quot; &lt;target-feature&gt; ( &quot;+&quot; | &quot;-&quot; ) )&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If a feature is not specific as &#39;+&#39; or &#39;-&#39; it is assumed to be in an &#39;any&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and is compatible with either &#39;+&#39; or &#39;-&#39;. The HSA runtime returns this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// information using the target-id, while we use the ELF header to determine</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// these features.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/offloading/amdgpu/#ad772ba5923d08e11379f06cc8c3c5e4d">isImageCompatibleWithEnv</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ImageArch, uint32&#95;t ImageFlags,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> EnvTargetID);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Struct for holding metadata related to AMDGPU kernels, for more information</Highlight></CodeLine>
